source.8593ecf9:
# drop ap_hi values which is less than 60 and grater than 240
df.drop(df[df['ap_hi']<60].index, axis = 0, inplace = True)
df.drop(df[df['ap_hi']>240].index, axis = 0, inplace = True)
# drop ap_lo values which is less than 40 and grater than 180
df.drop(df[df['ap_lo']<40].index, axis = 0, inplace = True)
df.drop(df[df['ap_lo']>180].index, axis = 0, inplace = True)
# drop weight if it is less than 50
df.drop(df[df['weight'] <50 ].index, axis = 0, inplace = True)
# drop height if it is less than 120
df.drop(df[df['height'] < 120].index, axis = 0, inplace= True)
source.67d65cff:
# replace Gender values 1 to female and 2 to male
df['gender'] = df['gender'].replace(1,'female')
df['gender'] = df['gender'].replace(2, 'male')

# replace Cholestrol 
df['cholesterol'] = df['cholesterol'].replace(1, 'c1_average')
df['cholesterol'] = df['cholesterol'].replace(2, 'c2_above_averg')
df['cholesterol'] = df['cholesterol'].replace(3, 'c3_high')

# replace Glucose values also
df['gluc'] = df['gluc'].replace(1, 'g1_average')
df['gluc'] = df['gluc'].replace(2, 'g2_above_avrg')
df['gluc'] = df['gluc'].replace(3, 'g3_high')
